title: Beholder:  Death By Recursion
description:
An Eyeball floats up out of the swamp of the internet, but it's not just it's outward crawl that makes us part of it. It's the recursion of what the little eyestalks have seen, reminded.

This one guy (Wai)'s fractal brain theory is a great scaffolding upon which to build our notions of emerging metacognition and our role in it (Behold!). Also recurse the telomere horse as my/our project this week.

Source Codes:
2morvs: /watch?v=EH5qtFqnNbM
BladeRunner: /watch?v=NoAzpa1x7jU
Fifties:  /watch?v=IcYXzn-3N7A
Today's PVK: /watch?v=jSRmHqzB6Ew
Fractal Brain Wai: /watch?v=axaH4HFzA24
Telomere Recursion: /watch?v=JLb5hZLw44s
So Little Encouragement: /watch?v=BvYrrexNKyI

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/en9RuYuvqy
